omission.translation[0].definitions[0].d: when you do not include or do not do something
omission.translation[0].definitions[0].e: The omission of her name was not a deliberate act.
omission.translation[0].definitions[1].n: a glaring omission (=one that is very bad and easily noticed)
omission.translation[0].definitions[1].e: Copies of the lists were posted so that omissions could be corrected.
Your failing to note her mistakes is a serious omission.
